# Supplemental Figure 6 {-}

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(reshape2)
library(rstatix)

knitr::include_graphics("Figs/S6_DMSO_compare.png")
```

**Supplemental Figure 6**. Time spent freezing during a five-minute exposure to TMT. A history of CFA injury increased time spent freezing, and this increase was prevented by administration of HC30031. Data presented as mean value +/- SEM.

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
data <- read_csv("Data/HC30031_mice.csv")

# Clean up start times

start_times <- data[data$Behavior == "start", ]

number_of_behavs <- data %>%
  group_by(ID) %>%
  summarise(
    n=n()
  )

data$dum <- rep(start_times$Start, number_of_behavs$n)
data$Start_clean <- data$Start - data$dum
data$Stop_clean <- data$Stop - data$dum

# Attach conditions data
conditions_data <- read_csv("Data/HC30031_conditions.csv")
data$CFA <- rep(conditions_data$Condition,number_of_behavs$n)

data$CFA <- as.character(data$CFA)
data$CFA <- factor(data$CFA,levels=unique(data$CFA))

frz_data <- data
frz_data$Drug <- "HC-030031"
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
# Get data
data <- read_csv("Data/DMSO_Frz.csv")

# Clean up start times

start_times <- data[data$Behavior == "start", ]

number_of_behavs <- data %>%
  group_by(ID) %>%
  summarise(
    n=n()
  )

data$dum <- rep(start_times$Start, number_of_behavs$n)
data$Start_clean <- data$Start - data$dum
data$Stop_clean <- data$Stop - data$dum

# Attach conditions data
conditions_data <- read_csv("Data/DMSO_Conditions.csv")
data$CFA <- rep(conditions_data$CFA,number_of_behavs$n)
data$CFA <- as.character(data$CFA)
data$CFA <- factor(data$CFA,levels=unique(data$CFA))

data$Drug <- "DMSO"
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
merge <- rbind(data,frz_data)
merge$Drug <- factor(merge$Drug, levels = c("DMSO","HC-030031"))
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
Exp_1_CFA.N <- merge 

b <- Exp_1_CFA.N  %>%
  filter(Behavior == "freeze") %>%
  group_by(ID,CFA,Drug) %>%
  summarise(
    sum=sum(Duration),
    Number=n(),
  ) %>%
  mutate(Perc = (sum / 300)*100) %>%
  mutate(Av_DUR = (sum / Number)) 
```

```{r}
res <- aov(Perc ~ CFA * Drug, data = b)
summary(res)

b %>%
  group_by(CFA) %>%
  pairwise_t_test(Perc ~ Drug)

b %>%
  group_by(Drug) %>%
  pairwise_t_test(Perc ~ CFA)
```
